name: ManagedTopics
description: Access information about managed topics in a community. Create, delete, and reorder managed topics.

createmanagedtopic(string,string,connect.signature: public static ConnectApi.ManagedTopic createManagedTopic(String communityId, String recordId, ConnectApi.ManagedTopicType managedTopicType)
createmanagedtopic(string,string,connect.description: Create a managed topic of a specific type for a community.

createmanagedtopic(string,string,connect.name: createManagedTopic
createmanagedtopic(string,string,connect.signature: public static ConnectApi.ManagedTopic createManagedTopic(String communityId, String recordId, ConnectApi.ManagedTopicType managedTopicType, String parentId)
createmanagedtopic(string,string,connect.description: Create a child managed topic for a community.

createmanagedtopicbyname(string,string,c.name: createManagedTopicByName
createmanagedtopicbyname(string,string,c.signature: public static ConnectApi.ManagedTopic createManagedTopicByName(String communityId, String name, ConnectApi.ManagedTopicType managedTopicType)
createmanagedtopicbyname(string,string,c.description: Create a managed topic of a specific type by name for a community.

createmanagedtopicbyname(string,string,c.name: createManagedTopicByName
createmanagedtopicbyname(string,string,c.signature: public static ConnectApi.ManagedTopic createManagedTopicByName(String communityId, String name, ConnectApi.ManagedTopicType managedTopicType, String parentId)
createmanagedtopicbyname(string,string,c.description: Create a child managed topic by name for a community.

deletemanagedtopic(string,string).signature: public static void deleteManagedTopic(String communityId, String managedTopicId)
deletemanagedtopic(string,string).description: Delete a managed topic from a community.

getmanagedtopic(string,string).signature: public static ConnectApi.ManagedTopic getManagedTopic(String communityId, String managedTopicId)
getmanagedtopic(string,string).description: Get a managed topic in a community.

getmanagedtopic(string,string,integer).signature: public static ConnectApi.ManagedTopic getManagedTopic(String communityId, String managedTopicId, Integer depth)
getmanagedtopic(string,string,integer).description: Get a managed topic, including its parent and children managed topics, in a community.

getmanagedtopics(string).name: getManagedTopics
getmanagedtopics(string).description: Get the featured and navigational managed topics for the community.

getmanagedtopics(string,connectapi.manag.description: Get managed topics of the specified type for a community.

getmanagedtopics(string,connectapi.manag.name: getManagedTopics
getmanagedtopics(string,connectapi.manag.signature: public static ConnectApi.ManagedTopicCollection getManagedTopics(String communityId, ConnectApi.ManagedTopicType managedTopicType, Integer depth)
getmanagedtopics(string,connectapi.manag.description: Get managed topics of the specified type, including their parent and children managed topics, in a community.

getmanagedtopics(string,connectapi.manag.name: getManagedTopics
getmanagedtopics(string,connectapi.manag.signature: public static ConnectApi.ManagedTopicCollection getManagedTopics(String communityId, ConnectApi.ManagedTopicType managedTopicType, String recordId, Integer depth)
getmanagedtopics(string,connectapi.manag.description: Get managed topics of the specified type, including their parent and children managed topics, that are associated with a given topic in a community.

getmanagedtopics(string,connectapi.manag.signature: public static ConnectApi.ManagedTopicCollection getManagedTopics(String communityId, ConnectApi.ManagedTopicType managedTopicType, List <String>)
getmanagedtopics(string,connectapi.manag.description: Get managed topics of the specified type, including their parent and children managed topics, that are associated with topics in a community.

getmanagedtopics(string,connectapi.manag.name: getManagedTopics
getmanagedtopics(string,connectapi.manag.signature: public static ConnectApi.ManagedTopicCollection getManagedTopics(String communityId, ConnectApi.ManagedTopicType managedTopicType, Integer pageParam, Integer pageSize)
getmanagedtopics(string,connectapi.manag.description: Get a page of managed topics.

reordermanagedtopics(string,connectapi.m.signature: public static ConnectApi.ManagedTopicCollection reorderManagedTopics(String communityId, ConnectApi.ManagedTopicPositionCollectionInput managedTopicPositionCollection)
reordermanagedtopics(string,connectapi.m.description: Reorder the relative positions of managed topics in a community.
